events.title: Sound Meditation
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: Facilitated by the Turtle Island Sound Meditation Collective. Experience an immersive sound journey, small-group integration, and a community celebration featuring gongs, crystal and Tibetan bowls, bamboo flutes, and drum circles.

events.title: Bike Repair Class
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: Learn how to fix your bike and take care of basic maintenance and tune-ups. This is a class, so no need to bring your bike - just come ready to learn.

events.title: HONK! NYC
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: Celebrate music and dance from around the globe featuring Rude Mechanical Orchestra, Trio DomTake, Maracatú Baque, Vado Diomande + Kotchegna Dance Company, and Kenny Wollesen & The Rose Thorne Memorial Marching Band, plus a craftivation station for instruments and costumes.

events.title: Free One-Hour Yoga Classes
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: A welcoming, multi-level outdoor class to move, breathe, and start your morning with mindfulness. Bring your own mat and enjoy heart-opening practice under the trees.

events.title: Fix Your Own Bike Workshop
events.location: Time's Up! - 626 E 14th St between Ave B & C, Manhattan
events.description: Open shop time: use our tools and stands to work on your bike with experienced volunteer mechanics on hand to coach and answer questions.

events.title: Wednesday Night Skate NYC
events.location: Meet at the south side of Union Square
events.description: Weekly social skate through NYC streets, rolling strong since 1996. All levels welcome; the group keeps a supportive pace with bright lights and good energy.

events.title: Thursday Night Bike Ride
events.location: Meet at the Columbus Circle entrance to Central Park
events.description: Hosted by Social Cycling NYC, this weekly ride welcomes new riders and seasoned commuters for a friendly spin through the city.

events.title: Bee Workshops
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: Join Rutgers University entomology researchers to learn how to identify native bees and support pollinators throughout the city.

events.title: Halloween Critical Mass - Manhattan
events.description: Celebrate renewable energy and people-powered transportation with a costumed Critical Mass ride. Bring your best Halloween look and ride for a greener future.

events.title: Halloween Adventure Garden & Rat Race Maze
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: A family-friendly Halloween celebration with fortune telling, face painting, thrilling coffin rides, and a rat-themed maze. The Rude Mechanical Orchestra performs at 6:00 pm.

events.title: Future Positive New Year's Eve Ride
events.location: Time's Up! Annual Ride - Multiple meetups & Belvedere Castle finale
events.description: Bike or skate into the new year with Time's Up! Meet at 9:45 pm (Williamsburg Bridge, Brooklyn side), 10:00 pm (Washington Square Park Arch), or 10:20 pm (Madison Square Park). Ride to Belvedere Castle for a joyous outdoor after-party with fireworks and dancing. Volunteers needed for ride leaders, so bring festive noisemakers!

events.title: Community Garden Volunteer Days
events.location: Help cultivate local community gardens across the East Village
events.description:
Support neighborhood greenspaces:
- Green Oasis Community Garden (8th St between Ave C & D) - 1st Sundays, next on Oct 5 at 12:00 pm.
- La Plaza Community Garden (SW corner 9th St & Ave C) - 2nd Saturdays, next on Oct 11 at 12:00 pm.
- Green Oasis Community Garden (117 Ave C between 7th & 8th St) - 3rd Saturdays, next on Oct 18 at 3:00 pm.
